name: Introductory Toxicology
description: Toxicological problems encountered in animals and humans; biochemical mechanisms and clinical factors of toxicological significance; models of drug-related diseases.
prerequisites: BCH210H1, BIO230H1/(BIO240H1, BIO241H1), CHM247H1/CHM249H1, PCL201H1 or Permission of the Course Coordinator

instructors: P Wells R Laposa J Uetrecht
